Wisdom seeks real things. Form and other conditioned fabricated dharmas are all false. Omniscience is a real dharma.
Because it is a real dharma, it surpasses conditioned dharmas.
Because it surpasses conditioned dharmas, it is said that this dharma is non-action, without an actor.
It is the dharma of non-destruction, without a destroyer.
This dharma does not come from the six perfections, so it is said to have no place it comes from.
It does not enter into the Buddha Dharma, so it is said to have no place it goes to.
Conditioned [dharmas] are false, so they do not abide;
Because there is no recollection or discrimination in the unconditioned dharmas, [the bodhisattva] also does not abide [in them].
The six destinies exist due to the combination of the five aggregates, but when the continuity of the five aggregates is destroyed, there are no destinies, and no measure or limit [to them].
Because there are no destinies, no measure, and no limit, the path of language is cut off. Because the path of language is cut off, one cannot attain form and other dharmas through practice.
